title: How to index my home page - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually this happens when Google bot is not able to access your site. Did you blocked home/index page in robots.txt file? Do the following steps: Edit your robots.txt file and add the following codeUser-agent: * Allow: / Login to your Google Webmaster Tool, click your preferred site and go under crawl section and click on FETCH AS GOOGLE.Leave URL blank as you want to index home page only and click on fetch and render for desktop.Repeat same step again but instead of DESKTOP, select Mobile:SMARTPHONE.Check your meta Tag of home page once as it should be, if it is having some different value in it:<meta name=“robots” content=“index”> Allow search engines robots to index the page, you don’t have to add this to your pages, as it’s the default.
